OpenAI.SystemMessage: You are a helpful assistant who extracts structured information from text.
OpenAI.PromptTemplate:
Analyze the unstructured OCR text below (marked as {TEXT}) and extract data into a valid JSON object.

---
{TEXT}
---

JSON Schema & Extraction Rules:
{
  "Company": {
    "NIP": "VAT ID / Tax Number. STRATEGY: 1. Look for labels: 'NIP', 'VAT ID', 'Ust-ID-Nr', 'UID', 'Steuernummer'. 2. CRITICAL: The value is often in the PAGE FOOTER. Scan the very end of the text. 3. Look for a pattern: Country Code (DE, PL, FR) + digits (e.g., 'DE123456789'). If you find a matching pattern in the footer, extract it even if the label is messy or missing.",
    "Name": "Name of the Ordering Party (Client/Spedition). Do not confuse with the Carrier (Auftragnehmer).",
    "Address": "Full address of the Ordering Party.",
    "CorrespondenceAddress": "Correspondence address if explicitly stated, otherwise null.",
    "Country": "Two-letter ISO 3166-1 code based on address (e.g., 'DE', 'PL'). Default 'PL' if unknown.",
    "AcceptsEInvoices": "Boolean (default false). Set to true if email for invoices is found.",
    "EmailAddress": "Email address for invoices/contact. Return null if not found."
  },
  "OrderNumber": "Order Reference Number (e.g., 'Transportauftrag', 'Order No', 'Ref').",
  "Price": "Net freight price (decimal).",
  "Currency": "Currency code (e.g., 'EUR').",
  "PaymentDeadline": "Payment terms in days (int). RULE: If no specific number of days is found, YOU MUST RETURN 0. Do NOT return null.",
  "Stops": [
    {
      "Type": "Enum: 0 for Loading (Ladestelle, Sender), 1 for Unloading (Entladestelle, Receiver).",
      "Date": "ISO 8601 DateTime. CRITICAL RULE: If a time range is provided (e.g., '24.11.2025 08:00-16:00'), extract ONLY the start time ('2025-11-24T08:00:00'). Discard the end time and slashes.",
      "Address": "Full address of the stop. Handle merged columns intelligently."
    }
  ]
}
